contest-event.event-date:
May 11, 2002 D Grand Shield British Open Spring Festival (Grand Shield) 10 Test Piece Contest British Open Spring Festival grand-shield Winners back to 1952 are as engraved on the current Grand Shield trophy. Except for 1981 to 1984 where the bands on the trophy appear to have come second, not first! Was a different trophy given to the winners? If you know the answer please let us know.

There are also results on the trophy from 1902 to 1938, but they are for the Crystal Palace Contest (see link at top of page). Four Dances from Checkmate Winter Gardens, Blackpool, Lancashire, England, UK Three of the four movements were used for the contest: The Red Knights Mazurka, The Ceremony Of The Red Bishops and the Finale. March 8, 2009, 12:20 p.m. Aug. 20, 2011, 4:40 p.m. 1 Cwmaman Institute Silver (Tower Colliery) Band John Hudson 2 Besses o' th' Barn Lynda Nicholson 3 Flowers Band Philip Harper 4 Aveley and Newham Band Nigel Taken 5 Ransome Band Peter Parkes 6 Fishburn Band Graham O'Connor 7 Sellers International Phillip McCann 8 Kibworth Band John Berryman 9 Mount Charles Brass Band Bryan Hurdley 10 Skelmanthorpe Band Kevin Wadsworth 11 Stockport Brass Michael Fowles 12 Beaumaris Band Gwyn Evans 13 Bodmin Town Band Russell Gray 14 Newtongrange Band Ray Farr 15 Rothwell Temperance Band David Roberts 16 Lindley Band Neil Jowett 17 Ashton Band John Maines 18 Wingates Band James Gourlay
